nodes.text: The Sharlson family was a family of Coruscanti who lived on Coruscant around the time of the Galactic Civil War. They lived in unit 2-B of a residential building they shared with the Sigus family, the Kinalos family, and "Old Man" Hamedaw. In the aftermath of the Second Battle of Coruscant and the Imperial Civil War in 10 ABY, much of Coruscant was laid waste and the Sharlsons were forced to flee their home. Their unit was looted and occupied by Imperial Stormtroopers.
